thought: To craft a light_gray_bed, I need to craft light_gray_dye, which can be crafted using an oxeye_daisy. The oxeye_daisy is currently at slot 16, so I will move it to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1
